# Sheety CRM

Sheety CRM is an open-source, "stateless" CRM that uses Google Sheets as its backend database. It is designed for solopreneurs and tiny teams who want a beautiful Kanban interface without leaving the ecosystem they trust.

## Core Features
- **Google Sheets Backend**: Reads/writes directly to user's sheet via OAuth. No data retention on our servers.
- **Kanban Pipeline**: Drag-and-drop interface for Opportunities.
- **Lead Management**: Detailed views for Leads with status, source, and activities.
- **Privacy First**: Your data stays in your Drive.
- **Open Source**: Free to self-host.

## Resources
- **Repository**: https://github.com/sdntsng/sheety-crm
- **Documentation**: https://github.com/sdntsng/sheety-crm/tree/master/docs
